title: Mirror current user message header layout to match other users' messages

requirements.summary: Reorder current user message header elements to match other users' layout (Message ID → Timestamp → Username → Avatar, left-to-right) without changing any styles
acceptanceCriteria: Current user message headers display elements in this left-to-right order: Message ID, Timestamp, Username, Avatar.
Other users' message header layout remains completely unchanged.
No CSS classes, inline styles, colors, font sizes, spacing, or visual properties are modified anywhere in the component.
The avatar remains on the far right for current user messages.
The message ID appears on the far left for current user messages.

file_operations.description: Reorder the DOM elements in the current user message header section to match the left-to-right sequence: Message ID → Timestamp → Username → Avatar. Locate the conditional rendering block for current user messages (isCurrentUser === true) and restructure only the header element order without touching any className attributes, inline styles, or other visual properties. Keep all existing Tailwind classes, colors, spacing, and layout utilities intact. Do not modify the header structure for other users' messages.
